official-title.#text: To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to submit to Congress an annual report on immigration policy directives issued by the Department of Homeland Security, to ensure that each such policy directive is subject to the rule making process described in

external-xref.#tail: of title 5, United States Code, and for other purposes.
